Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Specifies requirements for motor fuel advertising media
Summary: Specifies requirements for motor fuel advertising media; requires clearly visible signs relating to the pricing of motor fuels.
LawCode: Add ยง396-xx, Gen Bus L; amd ยง192, add ยง192-i, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to specifying requirements for motor fuel advertising media
